name: The Truth Of Golf.
description:
The truth of Golf.

have you ever wanted to know, how golf revolutioned the world? Here you will find out : )

This Game was created for Wooooooooowie, by Jonas Tyroller. Check out his YouTube channel, and please don't take the game to serious : )

Controls:

Pause  -Tab

Shoot  -Hold Left-Mouse-Button

Special thanks to my brother for creating the background music( the music will start after 4 minutes of my ennoying german accent are over, so if you not heard it yet, it's worth it) , to Kenney for his awesome Golf asset, to Landan Lloyd for his Ui Asset and to Avionx for his awesome Skyboxesesess.
